QuestData.Title: Amulet of Rukhmar: The Second Key
QuestData.Description:
The first point has been activated and two more remain. The second location is hinted at in the old outcast writing:
"Beneath the third fall of the great Skettis river lay the second key. May the ever-rushing waters sweep away those that might seek it."
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and activate the second key to the Apexis device.

Objectives.Objective: Follow the clue to activate the second key
